item.description:
Yale Philharmonia
Strauss and Brahms
free

Lets plan on meeting before hand for coffee at 6:45 at Blue State Coffee, (right around the corner from Woolsey). Please, patronize the shop, they are kind enough to reserve a large table for us there, which if you have ever been there is not easy. We will head over to Woolsey just before 7:40 to meet those who chose not to join us early.

Blue State Coffee
84 Wall Street
New Haven, CT 06511
http://www.bluestatec...

Lets meet in the front lobby at 7:40 if you are not joining us for coffee at Blue State.

Concert at 8:00 PM
Yale Philharmonia
Shinik Hahm, conductor. Strauss: Don Juan, with conducting fellow Adrian Slywotzky, and Oboe Concerto, with Woolsey Competition winner Carl Oswald; Brahms: Symphony No. 4.
http://yale.edu/music...
item.name: Strauss and Brahms
